    Polar Coordinate System

    CoordPolar.Rd

    Polar coordinates for circular plots

    Super class

    AdvancedGgplot::Coord -> CoordPolar

    Methods

    Public methods

    • CoordPolar$new()

    • CoordPolar$transform()

    • CoordPolar$clone()

    Inherited methods
    • AdvancedGgplot::Coord$transform_limits()

    Method new()

    Initialize polar coordinates

    Usage

    CoordPolar$new(theta = "x", start = 0, direction = 1)

    Arguments

    theta

    Variable to map to angle ("x" or "y")

    start

    Starting angle in radians

    direction

    Direction of rotation (1 or -1)

    Method transform()

    Transform coordinates to polar

    Usage

    CoordPolar$transform(x, y)

    Arguments

    x

    x-coordinates

    y

    y-coordinates

    Method clone()

    The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

    Usage

    CoordPolar$clone(deep = FALSE)

    Arguments

    deep

    Whether to make a deep clone.
